name: Caws for Concern
description: Play as a CoCo, a raven in the meditative beach, in the clean up game: “Caws For Concern”! Frustrated by lack of effort made by your homininae colleagues, the beach of Detritus Cove has been left trashed, and CoCo must take initiative to clean up the beach all by themselves! Hop, walk, and collect as much litter as you can before time runs out!
